archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1205
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to buy a device on pre-sale so that I can get it as soon as it's released. (Note: Paid on dispatch)

properties.value: DS: Pre-sales could be a status of avaiability check. Then order can be started normally, but there will be a dedicated configuration in OM required for delayed payment. Note: only for customers (not prospective)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
